Package reactor.tcp.spec

Specs provide a fluent DSL for building TcpClients and TcpServers using common configuration options.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IncrementalBackoffReconnectSpec
    A helper class for configure a new Reconnect.
    TcpClientSpec<IN,OUT>
    A helper class for specifying a TcpClient
    TcpServerSpec<IN,OUT>
    A TcpServerSpec is used to specify a TcpServer

Package reactor.tcp.spec Description

Specs provide a fluent DSL for building TcpClients and TcpServers using common configuration options.
